title: Madame Saturn: A Conversation with Carolyn Porco (Part 2)
description: We’ve saved the best for last as Carolyn tells Neil about photographing Earth in the Pale Blue Dot and The Day the Earth Smiled and her involvement in Star Trek and Contact.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: We’ve saved the best for last as Carolyn tells Neil about photographing Earth in the Pale Blue Dot and The Day the Earth Smiled and her involvement in Star Trek and Contact.
